amendment.description: Amendment restores eligibility criteria for the Weatherization Assistance Program to pre-stimulus levels.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 75 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to be used to pay the salaries of Department of Energy employees to carry out section 407 of division A of the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Young (IN) amendment (A068) Agreed to by voice vote.
